about_the_game:
Show the city who’s boss! Become the crime boss of your dreams, crushing rival mafia gangs, taking on dirty jobs, and making that cash until you own the entire city!

Dirty Jobs

Manage various illegal activities. Become the master of dark dealings by drug trafficking, counterfeiting, arms smuggling, and theft. Purchase legitimate businesses to conceal your operations and secretly run your operations from behind these establishments. Complete trade missions successfully to generate more revenue and open new businesses, using your strategic and risk management skills to reach the top!

Build Your Gang

Create a powerful gang by offering the no good and desperate jobs. The larger and more skilled your team, the more you’ll crush any mafia rivals. Build a strong team so your business operates more efficiently and produces faster. With your people by your side, become the most feared power in the city!

Become Feared

Expand your empire by taking rival mafia groups' businesses and territories. Use your gang to steal raw materials needed for drugs, counterfeit money, and weapons production. Each victory brings you one step closer to becoming the city’s most feared crime leader.

Take Over the City and Become the Boss

Take over the city step by step by crushing the rival mafia and claiming their territory for yourself. Each area you capture brings you one step closer to the ultimate confrontation with the city’s biggest cartel. Will you destroy them and solidify your throne as the undisputed leader of the criminal world?

content_descriptors.notes: In some missions in the game, murder occurs, and in some missions, drug production takes place.

short_description: Begin your rise as a crime lord! Mafia Simulator blends action, strategy, and an open world packaged in a simulation game. Conquer the city by managing illicit businesses like weed farms, weapons manufacturing, and cocaine trading…Just be careful; the choices you make could mean life or death.
